IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE NATIONAL COUNCIL OF JEWISH WOMEN (NCJW) IS A GRASSROOTS ORGANIZATION OF VOLUNTEERS AND ADVOCATES WHO TURN PROGRESSIVE IDEALS INTO ACTION. INSPIRED BY JEWISH VALUES, NCJW STRIVES FOR SOCIAL JUSTICE BY IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR WOMEN, CHILDREN, AND FAMILIES AND BY SAFEGUARDING INDIVIDUAL RIGHTS AND FREEDOMS. FORM 990, PART III, LINE 1 DESCRIPTION OF ORGANIZATIONS MISSION: THE NATIONAL COUNCIL OF JEWISH WOMEN (NCJW) IS A GRASSROOTS ORGANIZATION OF VOLUNTEERS AND ADVOCATES WHO TURN PROGRESSIVE IDEALS INTO ACTION. INSPIRED BY JEWISH VALUES, NCJW STRIVES FOR SOCIAL JUSTICE BY IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR WOMEN, CHILDREN, AND FAMILIES AND BY SAFEGUARDING INDIVIDUAL RIGHTS AND FREEDOMS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE NATIONAL COUNCIL OF JEWISH WOMEN (NCJW) IS A GRASSROOTS ORGANIZATION OF VOLUNTEERS AND ADVOCATES WHO TURN PROGRESSIVE IDEALS INTO ACTION. INSPIRED BY JEWISH VALUES, NCJW STRIVES FOR SOCIAL JUSTICE BY IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR WOMEN, CHILDREN, AND FAMILIES AND BY SAFEGUARDING INDIVIDUAL RIGHTS AND FREEDOMS. FORM 990, PART III, LINE 1 DESCRIPTION OF ORGANIZATIONS MISSION: THE NATIONAL COUNCIL OF JEWISH WOMEN (NCJW) IS A GRASSROOTS ORGANIZATION OF VOLUNTEERS AND ADVOCATES WHO TURN PROGRESSIVE IDEALS INTO ACTION. INSPIRED BY JEWISH VALUES, NCJW STRIVES FOR SOCIAL JUSTICE BY IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR WOMEN, CHILDREN, AND FAMILIES AND BY SAFEGUARDING INDIVIDUAL RIGHTS AND FREEDOMS.
IRS990.Desc: COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT: DIG-KNITTY (VOLUNTEERS KNIT ITEMS THAT ARE DONATED TO HOSPITAL PATIENTS, VETERANS, ASSISTED LIVING RESIDENTS AND OTHER); PARTNERS IN LITERACY (READING PROGRAMS AROUND THE CLEVELAND AREA); JUDAIC OUTREACH (VOLUNTEERS BRING HOLIDAY CHEER TO CLIENTS WITH SPECIAL NEEDS); OPERATION WARM-UP (ANNUAL COLLECTION OF WINTER CLOTHING ITEMS FOR THOSE HOMELESS IN NEED); AND SHARE WHAT YOU WEAR (VOLUNTEERS PROVIDE CLOTHING AND OTHER NEEDED SUPPLIES TO CHILDREN THROUGH SCHOOLS AND AGENCY SOCIAL WORKERS).

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: SOCIAL JUSTICE/ADVOCACY: FAMILY AND SEXUAL VIOLENCE WORKS TO COMBAT OPPRESSION, DISCRIMINATION AND BIAS RELATED TO GENDER AND/OR FAMILIAL RELATIONSHIPS; FOCUS ON FOSTER CARE (CONTINUOUS PROJECTS AIMED AT SUPPORTING THESE YOUTH AT EVERY STAGE AND EVERY AGE WHILE IN AND AGED OUT OF FOSTER CARE; STOP HUMAN TRAFFICKING PROVIDES EDUCATIONAL AND SUPPORTIVE SERVICES TO HELP PREVENT HUMAN TRAFFICKING IN THE COUNTY AND ADVOCATES ON BEHALF OF TRAFFICKING SURVIVORS; THREADS OF LOVE AND COMFORT PROVIDES BAGS FILLED WITH NEW CLOTHING AND TOILETRIES FOR VICTIMS OF SEXUAL ASSAULT WHEN THEY ARE TAKEN TO THE EMERGENCY ROOM; PROMOTE THE VOTE, PROTECT THE VOTE WORKS TO INCREASE VOTER TURNOUT AND EDUCATES VOTERS ON ISSUES; AND REPRODUCTIVE RIGHTS AND HEALTH FOCUS EXTENDS FROM INFANT MORTALITY AND SEX EDUCATION TO SEXUAL VIOLENCE AND ABORTION RIGHTS/ACCESS. AMONG OTHER ISSUES, THE COMMITTEE ADVOCATES FOR LEGISLATION THAT PROMOTES WOMEN AND CHILDREN'S HEALTH AND PROVIDES CARE PACKAGES TO SEXUAL ASSAULT SURVIVORS AT LOCAL HOSPITALS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE USED ACCORDING TO THE DONOR DESIGNATIONS; OTHERWISE, THEY CAN BE USED FOR GENERAL PURPOSES.

THE NATIONAL COUNCIL OF JEWISH WOMEN (NCJW) IS A GRASSROOTS ORGANIZATION OF VOLUNTEERS AND ADVOCATES WHO TURN PROGRESSIVE IDEALS INTO ACTION. INSPIRED BY JEWISH VALUES, NCJW STRIVES FOR SOCIAL JUSTICE BY IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR WOMEN, CHILDREN, AND FAMILIES AND BY SAFEGUARDING INDIVIDUAL RIGHTS AND FREEDOMS. FORM 990, PART III, LINE 1 DESCRIPTION OF ORGANIZATIONS MISSION: THE NATIONAL COUNCIL OF JEWISH WOMEN (NCJW) IS A GRASSROOTS ORGANIZATION OF VOLUNTEERS AND ADVOCATES WHO TURN PROGRESSIVE IDEALS INTO ACTION. INSPIRED BY JEWISH VALUES, NCJW STRIVES FOR SOCIAL JUSTICE BY IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR WOMEN, CHILDREN, AND FAMILIES AND BY SAFEGUARDING INDIVIDUAL RIGHTS AND FREEDOMS.

SOCIAL JUSTICE/ADVOCACY: FAMILY AND SEXUAL VIOLENCE WORKS TO COMBAT OPPRESSION, DISCRIMINATION AND BIAS RELATED TO GENDER AND/OR FAMILIAL RELATIONSHIPS; FOCUS ON FOSTER CARE (CONTINUOUS PROJECTS AIMED AT SUPPORTING THESE YOUTH AT EVERY STAGE AND EVERY AGE WHILE IN AND AGED OUT OF FOSTER CARE; STOP HUMAN TRAFFICKING PROVIDES EDUCATIONAL AND SUPPORTIVE SERVICES TO HELP PREVENT HUMAN TRAFFICKING IN THE COUNTY AND ADVOCATES ON BEHALF OF TRAFFICKING SURVIVORS; THREADS OF LOVE AND COMFORT PROVIDES BAGS FILLED WITH NEW CLOTHING AND TOILETRIES FOR VICTIMS OF SEXUAL ASSAULT WHEN THEY ARE TAKEN TO THE EMERGENCY ROOM; PROMOTE THE VOTE, PROTECT THE VOTE WORKS TO INCREASE VOTER TURNOUT AND EDUCATES VOTERS ON ISSUES; AND REPRODUCTIVE RIGHTS AND HEALTH FOCUS EXTENDS FROM INFANT MORTALITY AND SEX EDUCATION TO SEXUAL VIOLENCE AND ABORTION RIGHTS/ACCESS. AMONG OTHER ISSUES, THE COMMITTEE ADVOCATES FOR LEGISLATION THAT PROMOTES WOMEN AND CHILDREN'S HEALTH AND PROVIDES CARE PACKAGES TO SEXUAL ASSAULT SURVIVORS AT LOCAL HOSPITALS.

DECISIONS OF THE GOVERNING BODY ARE SUBJECT TO APPROVAL BY MEMBERS. ANY CHANGES TO THE BYLAWS MUST BE PRESENTED TO THE MEMBERSHIP IN THE BULLETIN PUBLICATION AND MUST BE VOTED ON AT ONE OF THE FOUR MAJOR MEETINGS DURING THE YEAR.
THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, VICE PRESIDENT OF ADMINISTRATION AND FINANCE, AND THE PRESIDENT REVIEW THE FORM 990 PRIOR TO FILING.
ALL BOARD MEMBERS ARE PROVIDED A CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM TO SIGN AND SUBMIT TO THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AT THE FIRST MEETING OF THE NEW BOARD YEAR. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR KEEPS ALL FORMS ON FILE.
THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
